data.name: ReadCaseAssignment
data.value: select top(1) REASON_CODE, OVERRIDE_IND, EFFECTIVE_DATE, DISCONTINUE_DATE, CREATED_TIMESTAMP, LAST_UPDATED_BY, LAST_UPDATED_TMST, SPD_ID, OFF_ID, OSP_CODE, OSP_DATE, CAS_NO from CKT_ASSIGN_CASE where (CAS_NO = @casNo) and (CREATED_TIMESTAMP = @createdTimestamp) and (OSP_DATE = @ospDate) and (OSP_CODE = @ospCode) and (OFF_ID = @offId) and (SPD_ID = @spdId)

data.name: UpdateCaseAssignment
data.value: update CKT_ASSIGN_CASE set REASON_CODE = @reasonCode, OVERRIDE_IND = @overrideInd, DISCONTINUE_DATE = @discontinueDate, LAST_UPDATED_BY = @lastUpdatedBy, LAST_UPDATED_TMST = @lastUpdatedTmst where (CREATED_TIMESTAMP = @createdTimestamp) and (SPD_ID = @spdId) and (OFF_ID = @offId) and (OSP_CODE = @ospCode) and (OSP_DATE = @ospDate) and (CAS_NO = @casNo)
